item.title: Traffic Alert Collision Avoidance System (TCAS II) – (EFB Installed or EFB Not Installed)

numlitem.para: System is deactivated and secured, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.
Operate TCAS in transponder-only mode by selecting TCAS Mode Selector to XPNDR position.

note.para: Contact Dispatch for operational requirements for foreign states.

numlitem.para: Flight Control to ensure TCAS is not required by Foreign States along planned route.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected TCAS/VSI indicator "RA INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate and secure the system by opening and collaring the TCAS circuit breaker.
